text: Gisele Bündchen and Tom Brady are celebrating their ninth wedding anniversary today, and they've shared intimate throwback photos from their big day to celebrate. The supermodel, 37, posted a pic of her kissing her husband ( while showing off the dramatic train on her lace bustier bridal gown ) at the altar Santa Monica Catholic Church in California, where they exchanged vows. ` ` What a ride this past 9 years have been. I love learning and growing with you. Happy anniversary love of my lifey!'' she wrote in the caption. The Patriots quarterback, 40, shared a more candid smooching snap to his followers. ` ` Live, Laugh, Love..... and I Love You! Feliz Aniversário! Te Amo
